ThingDef.label: Hainan hare
ThingDef.description: This hare hides in the bushes of its favored forests, rather than burrowing.

ThingDef.label: moon hare
ThingDef.description: These strangely-colored, red-eyed hares were bred on some lunar Glitterworld as luxurious pets. While moon hares fabled to cause mental breakdowns in those who stare too long into their eyes, their only real exceptional atribute is their exceptional comfort in high temperatures--on the rare occasion a moon hare escapes from captivity, they tend to seek the nearest desert.

ThingDef.label: red rock hare
ThingDef.description: These hares hop from rock to rock in the arid shrublands.

ThingDef.label: swamp hare
ThingDef.description: These hares are great swimmers, at home in swamps and marshes.
